issue.title: Catalog search form: list containing ampersand crashes
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Catalog search form: list containing ampersand crashes

When a element of a list in catalog search form contains an ampersand, form creation crashes.
This is due to the use of (DOM) createElement method used with content, we have tu create a textNode for this.
See: https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=31613#1106271770

in components\com_easysdi_catalog\libraries\easysdi\SearchJForm.php

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0
